languages.text: "Какой образцовый культист: тут вам и ритуалы, и порча, и заговоры. Даже с демонами сношался. И сразу сознался во всем — очень любезно".
"We have ourselves a model cultist here. There is a ritual, a curse, and a plot. He even consorted with 'them daemons.' How kind of him to confess to all that immediately."
languages.original_text: "Какой образцовый культист: тут вам и ритуалы, и порча, и заговоры. Даже с демонами сношался. И сразу сознался во всем — очень любезно".

traits.locale_text: "We have ourselves a model cultist. There is a ritual, a curse, a plot. He even consorted with 'them daemons.' How kind of him to confess to all that immediately."

"We have ourselves a model cultist here. There is a ritual, a curse, and a plot. He even consorted with 'them daemons.' How kind of him to confess to all that immediately."

languages.text: « Nous avons devant nous un véritable modèle du parfait fanatique. Un rituel, une malédiction et un complot... À l'entendre, il aurait même pactisé avec les "démons". Comme c'est aimable de sa part de tout avouer sans se faire prier. »
languages.original_text: "We have ourselves a model cultist here. There is a ritual, a curse, and a plot. He even consorted with 'them daemons.' How kind of him to confess to all that immediately."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons devant nous un véritable modèle du parfait fanatique. Un rituel, une malédiction et un complot... À l'entendre, il aurait même pactisé avec les "démons". Comme c'est aimable de sa part de tout avouer sans se faire prier. »

languages.text: «Estamos ante un cultista modelo. Un ritual perverso, una maldición, y un complot. Hasta ha confraternizado con "esos daemons". Muy amable por su parte el confesarlo todo al momento».
languages.original_text: "We have ourselves a model cultist here. There is a ritual, a curse, and a plot. He even consorted with 'them daemons.' How kind of him to confess to all that immediately."

traits.locale_text: «Estamos ante un cultista modelo. Un ritual perverso, una maldición, y un complot. Hasta ha confraternizado con "esos daemons". Muy amable por su parte el confesarlo todo al momento».

languages.text: “简直可以称得上是邪教徒的典范了，仪式、诅咒和阴谋一个都不缺，甚至还和那些恶魔‘媾和’。他这么快就承认了一切，实在是太贴心了。”
languages.original_text: "We have ourselves a model cultist here. There is a ritual, a curse, and a plot. He even consorted with 'them daemons.' How kind of him to confess to all that immediately."

traits.locale_text: “简直可以称得上是邪教徒的典范了，仪式、诅咒和阴谋一个都不缺，甚至还和那些恶魔‘媾和’。他这么快就承认了一切，实在是太贴心了。”

languages.text: 「ここには模範的な魔女団のメンバーがいる。儀式があり、呪いがあり、陰謀がある。彼はディーモンたちとさえ、契約を交わしていた。それを即座に告白するとは、なんと親切な奴だ」
languages.original_text: "We have ourselves a model cultist here. There is a ritual, a curse, and a plot. He even consorted with 'them daemons.' How kind of him to confess to all that immediately."

traits.locale_text: 「ここには模範的な魔女団のメンバーがいる。儀式があり、呪いがあり、陰謀がある。彼はディーモンたちとさえ、契約を交わしていた。それを即座に告白するとは、なんと親切な奴だ」

languages.text: "Wir haben hier einen rechten Vorzeigekultisten. Es gibt ein Ritual, einen Fluch und einen bösen Plan. Er hat sich sogar mit 'diesen Dämonen' verbrüdert. Wie nett von ihm, unverzüglich alles zu gestehen."
languages.original_text: "We have ourselves a model cultist here. There is a ritual, a curse, and a plot. He even consorted with 'them daemons.' How kind of him to confess to all that immediately."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben hier einen rechten Vorzeigekultisten. Es gibt ein Ritual, einen Fluch und einen bösen Plan. Er hat sich sogar mit 'diesen Dämonen' verbrüdert. Wie nett von ihm, unverzüglich alles zu gestehen."

languages.text: "Elimizde tam bir tarikatçı emsali var. Ayin, lanet ve komplo lafları geçiyor. Hatta 'o iblislerle' yoldaşlık bile etmiş. Tüm bunları hemen itiraf etmesi çok düşünceli bir davranış."
languages.original_text: "We have ourselves a model cultist here. There is a ritual, a curse, and a plot. He even consorted with 'them daemons.' How kind of him to confess to all that immediately."
